projects.title: Shopify Discount Functions Testing App
details: Developed an internal testing platform to streamline validation of Shopify Discount Function logic, enhancing team efficiency
Implemented robust CI/CD pipeline using Google Cloud Platform and Github Actions for reliable production deployment

projects.title: Shopify Flow App A/B Test
details: Spearheaded the development of an A/B testing initiative for Shopify Flow's template UI, focusing on conversion optimization
Designed and implemented comprehensive analytics tools to measure and evaluate test performance metrics

projects.title: Shopify Admin Shipping Integration
details: Led development initiatives in a fast-paced environment, collaborating closely with Marketing UX team to drive successful outcomes
Architected and implemented complex GraphQL-dependent logic using React TypeScript, ensuring robust functionality
Conducted thorough API integration research to optimize multiple service connections
Received commendation from senior developers for high-quality contributions and technical expertise

projects.title: FreeFlow Social Network
details: Architected and developed an innovative game-based social platform facilitating user connections through skill and resource matching
Successfully executed frontend migration from Gatsby to React with Redux Toolkit, improving application performance
Implemented sophisticated state management using Redux Toolkit's entityAdapter and async thunks
Demonstrated strong self-directed learning capabilities in mastering Redux Toolkit ecosystem
